originalText.text:
I had an incredible time Sunday at the Genesis Studio in Hudson Yards, New York! üöó Jenna, the studio concierge, made my visit extra special with her in-depth knowledge of the Genesis brand and the stunning vehicle lineup. üí° Explored the electrifying GV60, sleek G80, and the all-new 2.5-liter GV80‚Äîimpressive!

The second floor is a hidden gem‚Äîfeaturing a fantastic restaurant, cozy tea house, and a curated book store, all celebrating Hyundai's rich Korean culture and automotive legacy. üçµ Can't wait to return for a cup of authentic Korean tea!

And there's more! üåü The basement boasts a fantastic stage and a massive digital display, where the Hyundai vehicle history presentation left me in awe. Kudos to the amazing team behind this automotive haven at Hudson Yards! üôå Special shoutout to Jenna for her excellent insights on each vehicle. Well done, Genesis Studio! üëè #GenesisStudio #GenesisHouse #HudsonYards #AutomotiveExperience #KudosToTheTeam

originalText.text:
It was a wonderful experience, qe did a test Drive in the GV60 electric. The employees are extremely friendly, especially Felix, everyone should come and live the experience.

We hope they arrive in Spain soon!!!!

text.text:
It was a wonderful experience, qe did a test Drive in the GV60 electric. The employees are extremely friendly, especially Felix, everyone should come and live the experience.

We hope they arrive in Spain soon!!!!

originalText.text: Impressed with the high-end Korean cars that you can either get as a gas guzzler, starting at $50 k or all inclusive Electric $80 k. Beautiful colors, details and electronic enhancement

text.text: Impressed with the high-end Korean cars that you can either get as a gas guzzler, starting at $50 k or all inclusive Electric $80 k. Beautiful colors, details and electronic enhancement

originalText.text:
Felix was our host, and a wonderful ambassador for the brand ‚Äî- knowledgeable, enthusiastic and very patient.  He spent lots of time with us, as we had specific questions ‚Äî- he addressed every question with care.

Actually, everybody we met at both the Hudson Yards showroom and the much larger showroom in the Meatpacking district was kind and wanted us to understand the brand

We were interested buying a luxury SUV, and had already visited a Genesis dealership and did a test ride with a salesman.  But we needed more time with the vehicle.  We made an appointment on line and the showroom was expecting us.   An excellent experience all around.

Genesis is trying very hard to make a name in the luxury market, with an excellent product and a thoughtful marketing campaign. These showrooms are a great idea.     The staff get lots of walk ins, and try hard.   Be kind to them

originalText.text: The staff are very friendly. I hope they diversify from all electric vehicles as I've been hearing a lot of drawbacks these EVs have! They need to be selling IC cars primarily!
